articles.author: Jimmy Golen
articles.title: Connor McDavid scores in OT to give Canada 3-2 win over United States in 4 Nations Face-Off final - The Associated Press
articles.description: Connor McDavid scored at 8:18 of overtime in the 4 Nations Face-Off championship game to give Canada a 3-2 victory over the United States on Thursday night as the North American rivals turned what had been a tune-up for the 2026 Olympics into an geopolitical …
articles.content:
BOSTON (AP) When they played O Canada for the second time, there were no American fans left in the arena to boo. 
Instead, the Canadian team stood at the blue line, arm in arm, player and coach, wea… [+4902 chars]
